name: Attack on Atliz
description:
A lone survivor drifts through space, reclaiming vengeance for the lost planet of Atliz island... 

Welcome, captain! It's your job to commandeer the last functional spaceship on the planet Atliz. Your one weapon's taken quite a tumble, but there's no time to waste! Enemy forces are on your tail, and your job is to take out as many of them as possible. Stand your ground until the very end.

But no worries! For every enemy you defeat, you can sap some of their resources to upgrade our own. The stronger they get, the stronger you become. Just be sure to avoid the debris and explosives floating around the area.

Controls: Use WASD or the arrow keys to move your spaceship. Move your mouse to aim your turret, and hold down left-click or space bar to shoot. Navigate all user interfaces with the mouse.

Credits: All art, code, and music were created by a small team of two (LWCoding + Silver)! Sound effects were grabbed from a royalty-free source and are available for public use.
